sense.def:
A remedy
je nekaj, kar nam pomaga uspešno rešiti težavo.

seg.quote: ...a drastic remedy for lawlessness and disorder.

sense.def:
A remedy
je tudi nekaj, kar naj bi pozdravilo bolezen ali bolečino.

seg.quote: Home-made remedies can often lessen the pain.

sense.def:
To remedy something
pomeni popraviti nekaj, kar je napačno ali škodljivo.

seg.quote: Technicians laboriously tried to find and remedy faults.
